articles.author: Sascha Pare
articles.title: Scientists finally discover 'lost continent' thought to have vanished without a trace - Livescience.com
articles.description: Scientists have pieced together the remnants of a continent that broke off from western Australia 155 million years ago and seemingly vanished as it drifted northward toward Southeast Asia.
articles.content:
Researchers may have finally solved the mystery of what happened to the lost continent Argoland. (Image credit: kampee patisena via Getty Images)
